name: Simple Vector Store
semantic_context: The easiest way to experiment with vector stores, without external setup.
natural_language_description: 这是 Simple Vector Store 节点。主要用于: The easiest way to experiment with vector stores, without external setup.

ragStarterCallout.displayName: Tip: Get a feel for vector stores in n8n with our
ragStarterCallout.name: ragStarterCallout
ragStarterCallout.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tip: Get a feel for vector stores in n8n with our

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation Mode | 默认值: retrieve
available_options: Get Many (值: load) - Get many ranked documents from vector store for query
Insert Documents (值: insert) - Insert documents into vector store
Retrieve Documents (As Vector Store for Chain/Tool) (值: retrieve) - Retrieve documents from vector store to be used as vector store with AI nodes
Retrieve Documents (As Tool for AI Agent) (值: retrieve-as-tool) - Retrieve documents from vector store to be used as tool with AI nodes

notice.displayName: For experimental use only: Data is stored in memory and will be lost if n8n restarts. Data may also be cleared if available memory gets low, and is accessible to all users of this instance. More info
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: For experimental use only: Data is stored in memory and will be lost if n8n restarts. Data may also be cleared if available memory gets low, and is accessible to all users of this instance. More info

toolName.name: toolName
toolName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the vector store | (必填项)

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | (必填项)

memoryKey.name: memoryKey
memoryKey.description: The key to use to store the vector memory in the workflow data. These keys are shared between workflows.
memoryKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Memory Key | 作用: The key to use to store the vector memory in the workflow data. These keys are shared between workflows. | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': 'vector_store_key'} | (必填项)

embeddingBatchSize.name: embeddingBatchSize
embeddingBatchSize.description: Number of documents to embed in a single batch
embeddingBatchSize.natural_language_description: 参数名: Embedding Batch Size | 作用: Number of documents to embed in a single batch | 默认值: 200

clearStore.name: clearStore
clearStore.description: Whether to clear the store before inserting new data
clearStore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Clear Store | 作用: Whether to clear the store before inserting new data | 默认值: False

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: Search prompt to retrieve matching documents from the vector store using similarity-based ranking
prompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt | 作用: Search prompt to retrieve matching documents from the vector store using similarity-based ranking | (必填项)

topK.name: topK
topK.description: Number of top results to fetch from vector store
topK.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Number of top results to fetch from vector store | 默认值: 4

includeDocumentMetadata.name: includeDocumentMetadata
includeDocumentMetadata.description: Whether or not to include document metadata
includeDocumentMetadata.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Metadata | 作用: Whether or not to include document metadata | 默认值: True

useReranker.name: useReranker
useReranker.description: Whether or not to rerank results
useReranker.natural_language_description: 参数名: Rerank Results | 作用: Whether or not to rerank results | 默认值: False

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: ID of an embedding entry | (必填项)
